text:
1. Page Title: Struggles of a Writer

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: A dim room, a man at a desk.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Man: “Poverty surrounds me like shadows.”
       • Man: “Yet, I must write, I must create.”

   - Panel 2 — Setup: Papers scattered, a candle flickers.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Man: “What if my voice is never heard?”
       • Man: “I can’t let despair win!”

3. Layout: vertical strip

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The key idea is that through his struggles and experiences, he achieved greatness.
